description: The contract is for a fully enclosed digital vertical milling machine for the National Research Council of Canada, Saguenay site. The machine should meet the specifications in the Supply and Operation Requirements (SOR) package, including warranty, parts support, installation, delivery, and basic training in French.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Digital Vertical Milling Machine**
===========================================================

**Tender Information**
------------------------

- **Title in English**: Digital Vertical Milling Machine
- **Title in French**: Fraiseuse Verticale Numérique
- **Reference Number**: cb-331-13823179
- **Amendment Number**: 8
- **Solicitation Number**: 23-58139/A
- **Publication Date**: 2023-10-17
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-20T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2023-11-20
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-01
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-07-31
- **Tender Status**: Expired
- **Procurement Category**: GD
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

**Requirement Summary**
-------------------------

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC), Saguenay site, seeks a fully enclosed digital vertical milling machine for the machining shop operations, as part of the NRC Facility Modernization Initiative. The machine must meet specific requirements, including warranty, parts support, installation, delivery, and basic training in French. The proposed contract period extends from the date of contract award to 12 months post-award.

**Trade Agreements and Region of Delivery**
---------------------------------------------

- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Region of Delivery**: Saguenay, Quebec, Canada

**Key Dates**
-------------

- **Delivery Date**: On or before 6 months post-contract award

**Point of Contact**
------------------

- **File Number**: 23-58139/A
- **Contracting Authority**: Paul Hewitt
- **Phone Number**: (343) 573-1068
- **E-Mail**: Paul.Hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
- **Attachments**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22434/23-58139_rfp_milling_en_final.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22434/23-58139_amdt001_fraiseuse.pdf
